title: Final Fantasy 1-9 and PS1 (Includes Crono Trigger and Tactics)
description:
For all those PLAYSTATION 1 LOVERS, AND FINAL FANTASY LOVERS!!!


*MUST HAVE 7-ZIP INSTALLED TO UNZIP FILES, INSTALL IT FREE!

*ENJOY your Classic Final Fantasy Games 1 thru 9 without the troubles!!! All- in-One, consolidated, and in working manner.

THIS TORRENT INCLUDES :: A Fully working (with Graphics Plugins) PSX1 EMULATOR, with Final Fantasy 1 through 9 Roms-Games, with Final Fantasy Tactics Rom, and Crono Trigger Rom. 

This PSX1 Emulator HAS the BIOS file included, the Graphics Plugins included, even a few memory cards already. 

**IMPORTANT NOTE :: These are ALL PSX1 EMULATOR files and ROM games. No PS2 GAMES SUCH AS FFX, FFX-2, FFXI,etc. -- PS2 GAMES-ROMS ARE NOT INCLUDED.



*** No need to INSTALL anything (EXCEPT 7-ZIP).. just: 
0. INSTALL 7-ZIP UNZIPPING PROGRAM. *GOOGLE IT! INSTALL FREE!*
1. LAUNCH the 'ePSXe' Emulator Program in the 'epsx folder'.
2. *When inside EPSXE EMULATOR program* Go to FILE (at top)
3. RUN ISO
4. POINT IT (with Browse function) TO the folder with the Games-Roms ('Final Fantasy Roms-Games Folder' that is Included).
5. PICK YOUR GAME OF CHOICE, PLAY and Enjoy!!

IF you want, you can mess with the EPSXE program for keyboard/controller input, or video, or sound, etc. KNOCK YERSELF OUT :P lol. 

This torrent WILL WORK on older computers with little to no issues. Enjoy!

Any Questions or comments please POST. Thank You ALL !! GG www.ThePirateBay.se

~ Texasrowley (Nolan) :)
